param.name: Note
param.value: This demo will work in metric or inches. Not parameterized If you change tools manually : when drilling, deactivate the mill group when milling, deactivate the drill group

feature.name: Pièce
feature.call:
(workpiece definition) (author : Fernand Veilleux) #<wp_width> = [#<_units_width> * #param_w] #<wp_length> = [#<_units_width> * #param_l] #<wp_depth> = [#<_units_width> * #param_d] #<wp_wall> = [#<_units_width> * #param_wt] #<wp_corner_radius> = [#<_units_width> * #param_cr] #<wp_inside_width> = [#<wp_width> - #<wp_wall> * 2] #<wp_inside_length> = [#<wp_length> - #<wp_wall> * 2]
#<wp_x> = #param_x #<wp_y> = #param_y
o<select> CALL [31] [#param_alx] [#param_x] [#param_x - #<wp_length> / 2] [#param_x - #<wp_length>] #<wp_left> = #31 #<wp_right> = [#<wp_left> + #<wp_length>]
o<select> CALL [31] [#param_aly] [#param_y - #<wp_width>] [#param_y - #<wp_width> / 2] [#param_y] #<wp_front> = #31 #<wp_rear> = [#<wp_front> + #<wp_width>]
o<select> CALL [31] [#param_alz] [#param_z] [#param_z + #<wp_depth>] #<surface> = #31
#<bottom> = [#<surface> - #<wp_depth>] #<_rapid_z> = [#param_rap] #<_z_clear> = [#<surface> + #param_zcl + #param_rap] #<bottom_through> = [#<bottom> + #param_th]
/ o<#self_id_active> if [#param_sh] (show enabled) / o<stock> CALL [#<wp_left>] [#<wp_right>] [#<wp_front>] [#<wp_rear>] [#<surface>] [#<bottom>] [#param_cl] [#<wp_corner_radius>] [#<wp_wall>] / G0 X#param_x Y#param_y Z#<surface> / o<#self_id_active> endif (end workpiece definition)

feature.name: Group
feature.before:
(regular group) (authors : Nick Drobchenko and Fernand Veilleux) o<#self_id_active> if [#param_act]
(grouped items)

feature.help: Change drill and settings Changes setting accordingly even if disabled Message possible in terminal window
feature.call:
(drill change by Fernand Veilleux) #<_drill_feed> = #param_feed #<_drill_retract> = #param_retract #<_drill_mode> = #param_dm #<_drill_dwell> = #param_dw #<_drill_q> = #param_dq #<_drill_rpm> = #param_speed #<_spindle_dir> = #param_spindle_dir #<_cooling_mode> = #param_cooling
o<select> CALL [31] [#param_drill] [#param_d_usr] [#param_d_fra] [#param_d_met] [#param_d_num] [#param_d_let] #<drill_diameter> = #31 o<#self_id_metric> if [#<_metric> EQ 1] #<drill_diameter> = [#<drill_diameter> * 25.4] o<#self_id_metric> endif
#<drill_point_len> = [[#<drill_diameter> / 2] / TAN[#param_tip / 2]] (print,Drill info : diameter = #<drill_diameter>, point angle = #param_tip°, point length = #<drill_point_len>)
o<#self_id_ena> if [#param_act AND [#param_dnum NE #5400]] M9 o<#self_id_len_comp> if [#param_tlc EQ 0] T#param_dnum M6 o<#self_id_len_comp> elseif [#param_tlc EQ 1] T#param_dnum M6 G43 o<#self_id_len_comp> else T#param_dnum M6 G43 o<#self_id_len_comp> endif o<#self_id_ena> endif
o<#self_id_01> if [#<_spindle_dir> GT 0] o<set_spindle_rpm> CALL [#<_drill_rpm>] o<#self_id_01> endif
F#<_drill_feed> (end drill change)
feature.name: Drill Change

param.tool_tip: Drilling params will be set even if disabled

Point angle

param.tool_tip: G73 requires Q>0 and R G81 requires R G82 requires R and P G83 requires Q>0 and R
param.name: Drilling mode
param.options: With Chip Breaking - G73=73:Standard - G81=81:Dwell at bottom - G82=82:Peck Drilling Cycle - G83=83

feature.name: Drill Circle
feature.call:
(drill a regular circle of #param_num holes) (author : Fernand Veilleux) o<#self_id_active> if [#param_act] o<select> CALL [31] [#param_s] [#param_u_s] [#<surface>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4] o<select> CALL [32] [#param_dpt] [#param_u_dpt] [#<bottom_through>] [#31 + #<center_drill_depth>] [#<bottom>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4]
#<d> = [#param_dim * #<_units_radius>] o<#self_id_10> if [#param_opt] ; option diameter #<radius> = [#<d> / 2 * #<_units_radius>] o<#self_id_10> else ; option distance between holes o<#self_id_10a> if [[#param_ext MOD 360] EQ 0] #<radius> = [#<d> / 2 / SIN[180 / #param_num]] o<#self_id_10a> else #<radius> = [#<d> / SIN[#param_ext / #param_num]] o<#self_id_10a> endif o<#self_id_10> endif
o<#self_id_20> if [[[#param_ext MOD 360] NE 0] AND [#param_num GT 1]] #<fill> = [#param_ext * #param_num / [#param_num - 1]] o<#self_id_20> else #<fill> = #param_ext o<#self_id_20> endif
o<#self_id_center> if [#param_center] o<drill_single> CALL [#param_cx] [#param_cy] [#31] [#32] [#<drill_diameter>] [#<drill_point_len>] [#param_fcut] o<#self_id_center> endif
#<i> = 0 o<#self_id_loop> while [#<i> LT #param_num] o<rotate_xy> CALL [#<radius>] [0] [0] [0] [#param_a + [#<fill> / #param_num] * #<i>] o<drill_single> CALL [#param_cx + #<_rotated_x>] [#param_cy + #<_rotated_y>] [#31] [#32] [#<drill_diameter>] [#<drill_point_len>] [#param_fcut] [#param_auto] #<i> = [#<i> + 1] o<#self_id_loop> endwhile o<#self_id_active> endif (end drilling a regular circle)

param.name: Drill down to
param.options: User defined=0:Through=1:Center drill depth=2:Bottom=3:Half=4:One quarter=5:Three quarter=6

feature.name: Drill Circle
feature.call:
(drill a regular circle of #param_num holes) (author : Fernand Veilleux) o<#self_id_active> if [#param_act] o<select> CALL [31] [#param_s] [#param_u_s] [#<surface>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4] o<select> CALL [32] [#param_dpt] [#param_u_dpt] [#<bottom_through>] [#31 + #<center_drill_depth>] [#<bottom>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4]
#<d> = [#param_dim * #<_units_radius>] o<#self_id_10> if [#param_opt] ; option diameter #<radius> = [#<d> / 2 * #<_units_radius>] o<#self_id_10> else ; option distance between holes o<#self_id_10a> if [[#param_ext MOD 360] EQ 0] #<radius> = [#<d> / 2 / SIN[180 / #param_num]] o<#self_id_10a> else #<radius> = [#<d> / SIN[#param_ext / #param_num]] o<#self_id_10a> endif o<#self_id_10> endif
o<#self_id_20> if [[[#param_ext MOD 360] NE 0] AND [#param_num GT 1]] #<fill> = [#param_ext * #param_num / [#param_num - 1]] o<#self_id_20> else #<fill> = #param_ext o<#self_id_20> endif
o<#self_id_center> if [#param_center] o<drill_single> CALL [#param_cx] [#param_cy] [#31] [#32] [#<drill_diameter>] [#<drill_point_len>] [#param_fcut] o<#self_id_center> endif
#<i> = 0 o<#self_id_loop> while [#<i> LT #param_num] o<rotate_xy> CALL [#<radius>] [0] [0] [0] [#param_a + [#<fill> / #param_num] * #<i>] o<drill_single> CALL [#param_cx + #<_rotated_x>] [#param_cy + #<_rotated_y>] [#31] [#32] [#<drill_diameter>] [#<drill_point_len>] [#param_fcut] [#param_auto] #<i> = [#<i> + 1] o<#self_id_loop> endwhile o<#self_id_active> endif (end drilling a regular circle)

feature.call:
(tool change params and changing code) (author : Fernand Veilleux) #<_feed_normal> = #param_feed #<_rpm_normal> = #param_speed #<_spindle_dir> = #param_spindle_dir #<_cooling_mode> = #param_cooling #<_feed_vertical> = #param_v_feed #<_penetration_mode> = #param_pen #<_depth_step> = #param_stp #<_ramp_down_ratio> = [#param_pr / 100] #<_tool_usage> = #param_us #<_stepover_min> = #param_so_m #<_stepover_normal> = [#param_so_n / 100]
o<#self_id_ena> if [#param_act AND [#param_tnum NE #5400]] M9 o<#self_id_len_comp> if [#param_tlc EQ 0] T#param_tnum M6 o<#self_id_len_comp> elseif [#param_tlc EQ 1] T#param_tnum M6 G43 o<#self_id_len_comp> else T#param_tnum M6 G43 o<#self_id_len_comp> endif o<#self_id_ena> endif

feature.help: Creates a circle from it's center Can add a flat
feature.call:
(begin circle from center) (author : Fernand Veilleux) o<#self_id_active> if [#param_act] (if enabled) o<select> CALL [31] [#param_s] [#param_u_s] [#<surface>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4] o<select> CALL [32] [#param_dpt] [#param_u_dpt] [#<bottom_through>] [#<bottom>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4]
o<select> CALL [33] [#param_al_x] [#param_d * #<_units_radius> / 2] [0] [-#param_d * #<_units_radius> / 2] o<select> CALL [34] [#param_al_y] [-#param_d * #<_units_radius> / 2] [0] [#param_d * #<_units_radius> / 2]
o<circle> CALL [#param_cx + #33] [#param_cy + #34] [#param_d * #<_units_radius>] [#param_f * #<_units_radius>] [#param_rot] [#param_opt] [#param_dir] [#31] [#32] [#param_pv] [#param_fp] [#param_fc] o<#self_id_active> endif

(end radial array items)
(angular increment) #<angle#ID> = [#<angle#ID> + #<fill#ID> / #param_num] o<#self_id_loop> endrepeat
(restore coordinate system) G#<old_coord_system#ID> G10 L2 P#5220 X#<offset_x#ID> Y#<offset_y#ID> Z#<offset_z#ID> R#<offset_r#ID> o<#self_id_active> endif (end radial array)
feature.name: Radial Array
feature.before:
(radial array) (authors : Nick Drobchenko and Fernand Veilleux) o<#self_id_active> if [#param_act] (calc radius) o<#self_id_option> if [#param_opt EQ 0] (distance is radius) #<radius#ID> = [#param_d * #<_units_radius>] o<#self_id_option> elseif [#param_opt EQ 1] (distance is diameter) #<radius#ID> = [#param_d / 2 * #<_units_radius>] o<#self_id_option> else (distance is between groups of items) o<#self_id_optiona> if [[#param_fill MOD 360] EQ 0] #<radius#ID> = [#param_d / 2 / SIN[180 / #param_num] * #<_units_radius>] o<#self_id_optiona> else #<radius#ID> = [#param_d / SIN[#param_fill / #param_num] * #<_units_radius>] o<#self_id_optiona> endif o<#self_id_option> endif
o<#self_id_fill> if [[[#param_fill MOD 360] NE 0] AND [#param_num GT 1]] #<fill#ID> = [#param_fill * #param_num / [#param_num - 1]] o<#self_id_fill> else #<fill#ID> = #param_fill o<#self_id_fill> endif
(get and save current coords system offsets) #<old_coord_system#ID> = [#<_coord_system> / 10] o<get_offsets> CALL #<offset_x#ID> = #<_offsets_x> #<offset_y#ID> = #<_offsets_y> #<offset_z#ID> = #<_offsets_z> #<offset_r#ID> = #<_offsets_r>
(calc new offsets) #<cx#ID> = [#<_offsets_x> + #param_cx] #<cy#ID> = [#<_offsets_y> + #param_cy] #<angle#ID> = [#<_offsets_r> + #param_ang]
(change coords system) G#<_off_rot_coord_system>
o<#self_id_loop> repeat [#param_num] (get rotated coordinates then apply to new coords) o<rotate_xy> CALL [#<cx#ID> + #<radius#ID>] [#<cy#ID>] [#<cx#ID>] [#<cy#ID>] [#<angle#ID>]
o<#self_id_rotate_choice> if [#param_rot] (enable rotations of items) G10 L2 P#5220 X#<_rotated_x> Y#<_rotated_y> Z#<offset_z#ID> R#<angle#ID> o<#self_id_rotate_choice> else G10 L2 P#5220 X#<_rotated_x> Y#<_rotated_y> Z#<offset_z#ID> R#<offset_r#ID> o<#self_id_rotate_choice> endif
(radial array items)

o<#self_id_end> if [#5000 GT 0]
(return to origin w/ either a line 1 or an arc 5) o<select> CALL [31] [#param_ted] [#<poly_global_engagement>] [#param_te] o<#self_id_end0> if [#param_cdir GT 1] o<poly_add_item> CALL [5] [#param_x] [#param_y] [#param_cdir] [#param_orcs] [#param_orcr] [#param_orrev] [#31] [#param_height] [#param_atype] [#param_rev2] o<#self_id_end0> else o<poly_add_item> CALL [1] [#param_x] [#param_y] [#param_cdir] [#param_orcs] [#param_orcr] [#param_orrev] [#31] o<#self_id_end0> endif
o<poly_create> CALL
o<#self_id_rev> if [#param_dir] o<poly_reverse> CALL o<#self_id_rev> endif
o<poly_copy_mill> CALL
o<optimize> CALL [#<_mill_data_start>] [#param_comp] [0] [#<poly_global_engagement> * #5410 / 100]
o<select> CALL [31] [#param_s] [#param_u_s] [#<surface>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4] o<select> CALL [32] [#param_dpt] [#param_u_dpt] [#<bottom_through>] [#<bottom>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4]
o<poly_mill> CALL [#<_mill_data_start>] [#31] [#32] [#param_comp] [#param_fcut] [#param_dx] [#param_dy] [#param_rot] [#<poly_global_engagement>]
o<#self_id_end> endif o<#self_id_active> endif (end polyline)
